replies.body: Fake strafes and half strafes are a really good way to throw your opponent off. If you're willing to trade combos I can give you my zigzag strafe combo. People who've 1v1'd me on Kohi know how deadly it can be :P

replies.body: The thing is, you've never got to 1v1 me on Kohi and I never see you in game anyways so you've never seen it in action. The thing is I get rekd by a lot of players who I'm even with or slightly better than in Kohi. I'm not suggesting I'm better than anyone I'm just saying, I've improved a lot since I've even seen you in game and I play Kohi way better than Nexus. The players who have faced me on Kohi and seen/played with & against on Nexus know this. Maybe we should try a 1v1 sometime, I'll lose almost indefinitely but I'll at least show you I'm not another pushover.
